## RoseParams interface

Rose gauge construction parameters

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RoseParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundColor?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.backgroundcolor.md) | ss.BackgroundColor | <i>(Optional)</i> Gauge background color - default: <code>steelseries.BackgroundColor.DARK_GRAY</code> |
|  [backgroundVisible?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.backgroundvisible.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Draw gauge background? - default: <code>true</code> |
|  [foregroundType?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.foregroundtype.md) | ss.ForegroundType | <i>(Optional)</i> Gauge foreground type - default: <code>steelseries.ForegroundType.TYPE1</code> |
|  [foregroundVisible?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.foregroundvisible.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Draw gauge foreground? - default: <code>true</code> |
|  [frameDesign?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.framedesign.md) | ss.FrameDesign | <i>(Optional)</i> Gauge frame design - default: <code>steelseries.FrameDesign.METAL</code> |
|  [frameVisible?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.framevisible.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Draw gauge frame? - default: <code>true</code> |
|  [odometerParams?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.odometerparams.md) | ss.OdometerParams | <i>(Optional)</i> Odometer construction params |
|  [pointSymbols?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.pointsymbols.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Cardinal points labels - default: <code>[&quot;N&quot;, &quot;E&quot;, &quot;S&quot;, &quot;W&quot;]</code> |
|  [size?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.size.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Gauge size (px) - default: smaller dimension between <code>canvas.width</code> and <code>canvas.height</code> |
|  [titleString?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.titlestring.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> \* Gauge upper title string - default: <code>&quot;&quot;</code> |
|  [unitString?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.unitstring.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Gauge lower string title - default: <code>&quot;&quot;</code> |
|  [useOdometer?](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.useodometer.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Draw odometer? - default: <code>false</code> |
